attributes.action: ensure NHS dental treatment for all.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
My NHS dentist recently decided to ditch all NHS patients in favour of those on Denplan. Those that were NHS were required to switch over to become private patients or move on to another practice. 

It was down to the individual to find another NHS practice, which has proved difficult and I have been forced to join Denplan to ensure I can get dental treatment.

The cost for me and my two parents is over £60.00 per month, but over the course of 1 year I have only received two minimal check ups for my money.

We would like to see all dentists offer NHS dentistry as a requirement, or at least ensure that those dentists who are wishing to opt out offer patient’s alternative places at another NHS dentist before they are permitted to do so.

We also feel that businesses such as Denplan should be thoroughly investigated and more carefully monitored, to ensure that those who become private patients do so only by choice and not by requirement.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
